availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Military regiment of the Army of the Potomac. Cavalry regiment organized at Cleveland and Camp Dennison, Ohio from August through October, 1861. Mustered out at St. Louis, Missouri on October 12, 1865

ab.bibl: Frederick H. DyerA Compendium of the War of the Rebellion: Compiled and Arranged from Official Records of the Federal and Confederate Armies, Reports of the Adjutant Generals of the Several States the Army Registers, and other Reliable Documents and Sources, https://archive.org/details/08697590.3359.emory.edu/page/n1479/mode/2up?q=2nd+Ohio+Cavalry, pp. 1473-1474.
